text: kah do, "main apane rab kee or se ek spasht pramaan par qaayam hoon aur tumane use jhuthala diya hai. jis cheez ke lie tum jaldee macha rahe ho, vah koee mere paas to nahin hai. nirnay ka saara adhikaar allaah hee ko hai, vahee sachchee baat bayaan karata hai aur vahee sabase achchha nirnaayak hai.
